name: AirBorne Sea
description:
Are you an old sea dog and can't live a day without a light sea breeze?
Do you love the smell of napalm in the morning?
And your shooting accuracy and speed of reaction are legendary?

That’s why you here! Feel free to send present with 14 pounds of lead to bad guys and enjoy the results of your work with fireworks of planes burn like a red coal.
Now you can go wild! But remember that your ship must survive, otherwise not only the sea waves, but also the heavens may be behind your back.

Key Features:
  • Environment generation.
  • Arsenal includes 40mm AA cannons and RIM-7 missiles.
  • Progressively difficult levels with more enemies and higher aggression.
  • Different enemy planes: Attack aircraft, Fighter aircraft, Torpedo bomber and Bomber.
  • Perks to upgrade your ship and cannon.
